      • populateIssueTypes

        @ModelAttribute(value="issuetypes")
public IssueType[] populateIssueTypes()
        Set the issue types into the model
        Returns:
        an array of IssueType objects that will be used to populate the issue types drop down in the contact WISE form

      • populateReCaptchaPublicKey

        @ModelAttribute(value="reCaptchaPublicKey")
public String populateReCaptchaPublicKey()
        Set the ReCaptcha public key
        Returns:
        a string containing the ReCaptcha public key that will be used to determine if we should display the ReCaptcha image on the bottom of the form

      • populateTeachers

        @ModelAttribute(value="teachers")
public Vector<User> populateTeachers()
        Set the teachers if the user is a student
        Returns:
        a vector of teacher user objects that will be used to populate the teacher drop down in the contact WISE form

      • populateDiscourseSSOLoginURL

        @ModelAttribute(value="discourseSSOLoginURL")
public String populateDiscourseSSOLoginURL()
        Set the Discourse SSO login url
        Returns:
        a string containing the Discourse SSO login url that will be used to display a link to the Discourse page if the user is a teacher

      • checkRecaptcha

        protected void checkRecaptcha(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        If the user is not logged in, we will check that they answered the reCaptcha correctly. This is called after ContactWISEValidator.validate()
